entry.title: Crystal - Lactose Free Non Hydrogenated Margarine - 907 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Crystal
Type: FOOD
Price: 4.99

Crystal - Soft Non Hydrogenated Margarine  - 2 Lbs

  • No trans fat
  • Lactose-free
  • Vegan
  • Non-hydrogenated
  • No artificial flavors
  • Source of omega-3 fatty acids
  • 907g
  • Keep refrigerated

Create a delicious cake that disappears quickly and other delectable treats with this trans free solid margarine. It adds a creamy butter-like flavor to dishes, but contains no cholesterol unlike traditional butter. This margarine is perfect for baking fresh treats to perfection. Plus, it also is an excellent flavor enhancer in sauces, soups, and gravies or use it as a spread. It features the same rich butter flavor your customers know and love at a more economical price. Use it to create delectable and savory dishes that keep your customers coming back for more!

With subtle flavour and a soft consistency, Crystal Margarine is formulated to be directly spreadable from refrigerated temperatures and is ideal for most cooking applications. Made from non-hydrogenated vegetable oil and canola oil, our products are vegan, gluten-free, lactose-free and are an excellent source of omega-3 fatty acids.

We proudly use environmentally friendly packaging. Our Crystal Margarine containers are reusable, dishwasher, and microwave safe.

entry.title: Lactantia - Provençal Garlic Butter - 125 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lactantia
Type: FOOD
Price: 3.29

Lactantia - Provencal Garlic Butter - 125 g

Perfect for garlic bread or adding flavour to pasta, vegetables, rice, and meat.

This butter is sure to be a rich, creamy addition to your recipes. This butter allows you to control the amount of sodium and flavor that goes into your dishes. When heated and used for cooking applications, it lends a caramelized, nutty flavor and enhances the taste of the food it's being cooked with. From ensuring your chocolate chip cookies bake to perfection to adding it in with eggs to create the perfect fluffy cake, this butter is an essential ingredient to keep on hand.

This butter is made from the freshest, high-quality sweet cream and has a great texture for spreading, making it perfect for topping off toast or breads. This butter is perfect for baking or cooking, as you can control the added salt included in the mixture to ensure the end results meet your desired flavor. Stock your kitchen with this fresh, premium butter to ensure you always have a superior butter on hand to add to your dishes.

entry.title: Parmalat - Bulk Salted Butter Solid Block - 25 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: Parmalat
Type: FOOD
Price: 299.99

Parmalat - Bulk Salted Butter Solid / Block - 25 Kg

  • 80% M.F.
  • 100% Canadian milk
  • 25 kg
  • Keep refrigerated

Available in Salt Free and Semi Salted formats, Lactantia salted butters deliver the same freshness, creamy texture and uncompromising performance as Salted Butter.
Equally suited for cooking, baking, frying and blending.

Butter is an essential ingredient in a variety of dishes with many uses in the kitchen, so be sure to stock up by purchasing our butter in bulk. These products are perfect for use in the front- or back-of-house areas, depending on your needs. We also offer clarified butter, which is pure butter fat, as well as whipped options that easily spread on sandwiches and toast.

Use wholesale butter for a variety of uses in the kitchen or front-of-house area of your restaurant, diner, bistro, or banquet hall. All of these products are made with high-quality ingredients, which give them a smooth texture and rich flavor that easily accentuates your recipes. Additionally, because we provide butter in bulk, you can be sure that you’ll have enough to use in all of the dishes in your establishment.
